reviews.review:
É Portal 2, se você não conhece, a hora é agora. Jogo de puzzle, personagens inteligentes e incríveis(eu te amo GLaDOS!!)
Ainda muito bom, mesmo após anos de seu lançamento. É sério, todo mundo que tem uma conta da Steam deveria ter e jogar esse magnífico jogo. E ainda tem um multiplayer co-op muito bom, seguindo na mesma pegada de puzzles inteligentes.

Se eu recomendo? COM CERTEZA!!

NOTA: 10/10

Infelizmente, a Valve ainda não aprendeu a contar até 3 (Half-Life, Portal, Team Fortress)...
Me gusta el juego porque puedo usar el mouse

Between the mind bending puzzles and twisting storytelling your brain will look like a pretzel. And who doesn't like pretzels?
os puzzles são inteligentes, a jogabilidade simples mas pratica, ambientação fenomenal e uma história digna de 10 filmes dirigidos por christopher nolan, jogue
Great puzzles, excellent voice actors, amazing sequel

Best sequel ever, highly recommended. The Puzzles are more complex than Portal 1, because that if you aren't familiar with Portal or FPS it may be a lot harder to complete. The game is 4 times longer than Portal 1, which is pretty nice.

10/10

this game is pretty godly, i recommend it to anyone looking for a good game with humor and a amazing story. It also has co-op if youre into that and you can use community test chambers. all around great game. 11/10

i personaggi fanno morire dal ridere
varie modalità di gioco che consentono una enorme replay ability e moltissimo divertimento

CONTRO Nuoce alla vostra vita sociale e lavorativa

This is probably the first game in my long time gaming career of +/- 19 years of gaming, that is 1) so addictive, 2) and yet so tiring.

It makes me utter the all known words "Just one more map", but lets me end up like a zombie at 4 am in the morning looking like sh!t and staring at my screen.

The game is not only very well playable, it has such a rich challenge of intellectual quests to finish, combined with a perfectly designed GUI to make your own maps.

Thumbs up, 10/10
its one of the best puzzle games i have played
Эта игра, одна из самых прекрасных творений головоломок с сюжетом)

Ist wirklich ein total interessantes Spiel, leider war die Story relativ schnell durchgespielt. Aber auf jeden Fall sein Geld wert! Wer das erste Portal gespielt hat und wem es gefallen hat, muss Portal 2 unbedingt ausprobieren!

Extremely good puzzle game, extremely good story.
like it alot.

Portal 2 takes everything that was great about the original and expands upon it greatly. This was a game I really enjoyed when I was younger. Seeing the worn down Aperture was truly an incredible setting. Listening to Cave Johnson ramble on and hearing him slowly deteriorate along side the abandoned studio was so much fun. The way that Wheatly suddenly turns on you and tries to kill you towards the end of the story was brilliant and kept the story progressing alongside the increasingly difficult puzzles. Even if yohu don't enjoy single play puzzle games this game will still enthrall you through its genius, friendship breaking/ destroying co-op campaign. I recently played though this campaign with a friend of mine and beat it all in one sitting. The physics are perfect, the setting is mysterious and enthralling. Definitely recommend. 9/10

Одна из лучших игр от вольво, на равне с Half-Life(хоть он мне и не особо зашёл). Сюжет хорошо переплетается с простым выполнением "тестов"(головоломок), что не даёт тебе заскучать от однообразия. Кооператив предоставляет более трудные головоломки, т.к. там уже две пары портал-пушек. Если честно, в одиночке большинство головломок нетрудные для взрослого человека, но она вывозит засчёт сюжета. В кооперативе же, сюжет отходит на второй план но благодаря усложненности головоломок и наличии напарника она также достойна внимания.
Wszystko fajna ale gra dla ludzi myślących bo dla ludzi trochę mniej lubiących zagadki i łamigłówki będzie trudniejsza.
ЕБ ТВАЮ МАТЬ САНЯ ПОРТАЛ ПОСТАВЬ МНЕ

Eu joguei o Portal 1 e em sequência joguei o 2 e achei uma lindeza q só
A história é muito boa, tem uns plots ótimos tbm, e quando você se aprofunda na história é simplismente INCRÍVEL!
A jogabilidade melhorou até bastante e oque no 1 dava apenas umas 2/3 horas de gameplay, a Valve compensou bastante com 7/8 horas, ainda mais com o modo Co-op, que certamente pode render muito mais horas e é muito divertido.
非常棒的游戏，强烈推荐

Now, there isn't much to say here. I didn't play the first game so i don't know a lot about the story, and I am only at chapter 4 out of 9 in this game, BUUUUTTTT, If you like mind twisting puzzles then I think this game is for you.
Even if not. Check it out.
